title: Tests failing when upgrading slashing protections interchange tests to `v5.2.1`
body:
### Describe the bug

When upgrading slashing protections interchange tests to `v5.2.1`, some tests fails.

### Has this worked before in a previous version?

_No response_

### ðŸ”¬ Minimal Reproduction

In `WORKSPACE` file, replace 
```
http_archive(
    name = "eip3076_spec_tests",
    build_file_content = """
filegroup(
    name = "test_data",
    srcs = glob([
        "**/*.json",
    ]),
    visibility = ["//visibility:public"],
)
    """,
    sha256 = "91434d5fd5e1c6eb7b0174fed2afe25e09bddf00e1e4c431db931b2cee4e7773",
    url = "https://github.com/eth-clients/slashing-protection-interchange-tests/archive/b8413ca42dc92308019d0d4db52c87e9e125c4e9.tar.gz",
)
```

by

```
http_archive(
    name = "eip3076_spec_tests",
    build_file_content = """
filegroup(
    name = "test_data",
    srcs = glob([
        "**/*.json",
    ]),
    visibility = ["//visibility:public"],
)
    """,
    sha256 = "6853790a8d7032a1cbbf6511e3b03927581123ed918822f00431cbf4ff2e4354",
    url = "https://github.com/eth-clients/slashing-protection-interchange-tests/archive/refs/tags/v5.2.1.tar.gz",
)
```

Then run 
```
 bazel test //validator/client:go_default_test
```

### Error

```text
--- FAIL: TestEIP3076SpecTests (5.33s)
    --- FAIL: TestEIP3076SpecTests/duplicate_pubkey_slashable_attestation (0.15s)
        assertions.go:174: slashing_protection_interchange_test.go:251 pre validation should have failed for attestation
    --- FAIL: TestEIP3076SpecTests/multiple_interchanges_multiple_validators_repeat_idem (0.27s)
        assertions.go:143: slashing_protection_interchange_test.go:217 Unexpected error: attempted to sign a double proposal, block rejected by local protection
    --- FAIL: TestEIP3076SpecTests/multiple_interchanges_overlapping_validators_merge_stale (0.22s)
        assertions.go:46: slashing_protection_interchange_test.go:219 pre validation should have failed for block, both values are equal: <nil> (<nil>)
    --- FAIL: TestEIP3076SpecTests/multiple_interchanges_overlapping_validators_repeat_idem (0.38s)
        assertions.go:174: slashing_protection_interchange_test.go:251 pre validation should have failed for attestation
    --- FAIL: TestEIP3076SpecTests/multiple_interchanges_single_validator_first_surrounds_second (0.21s)
        assertions.go:174: slashing_protection_interchange_test.go:251 pre validation should have failed for attestation
    --- FAIL: TestEIP3076SpecTests/multiple_interchanges_single_validator_multiple_blocks_out_of_order (0.17s)
        assertions.go:46: slashing_protection_interchange_test.go:219 pre validation should have failed for block, both values are equal: <nil> (<nil>)
    --- FAIL: TestEIP3076SpecTests/multiple_interchanges_single_validator_second_surrounds_first (0.20s)
        assertions.go:174: slashing_protection_interchange_test.go:251 pre validation should have failed for attestation
    --- FAIL: TestEIP3076SpecTests/multiple_interchanges_single_validator_single_att_out_of_order (0.20s)
        assertions.go:174: slashing_protection_interchange_test.go:251 pre validation should have failed for attestation
```


### Platform(s)

Mac (Apple Silicon)

### What version of Prysm are you running? (Which release)

develop

### Anything else relevant (validator index / public key)?

_No response_
